about_the_game:
The last bastion of humanity in the boundless and perilous cosmos.
Become a citizen of the Spacefarer-12 station and explore abandoned worlds in search of resources and valuable loot in a cooperative first-person horror experience.

You are not alone

At the station, you will always be awaited by 'Mother' - a caring guide and mentor who will fairly evaluate the results of your previous expeditions and reward your efforts. If you return, of course.

// The sequence is disrupted. Some information is concealed from the user to reduce the risk of emotional trauma. Mother.
// Confirmation of topic change request... Success



Gather your friends into a squad, with up to 4 players. After landing in a new unexplored world, you'll have one day to bring back as much valuable loot to the ship as possible.

But be careful - the local inhabitants may show excessive curiosity towards unexpected guests and even desire to taste you.

Gadgets are fun!

According to Code 3FSGON2 on the protection of wildlife and to avoid increased risk of injury, you, like other researchers, are not permitted to carry lethal weapons.




However, you will have a state-of-the-art spaceship at your disposal, along with a whole arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish a wide range of tasks:
  • Scouting
  • Vehicles
  • Transportation
  • Resource extraction from underground deposits
  • Attracting and repelling living creatures of various threat levels
  • Stress relief

Progress without limits

Saving humanity is no easy mission. Every toaster, engine, or rubber expander brought to the space station is a resource that will be directed towards survival by the caring hands of Mother.

In return, Mother doesn't demand quotas from you and grants the freedom to upgrade, level up, and move forward, regardless of your results. You will never lose your progress, and your arsenal will only continue to grow.

In your hands lies the fate of the citizens of Spacefarer-12 station.




// Additional information request...
// Researcher mortality rate on expeditions - Classified
// Primary mission objective - Classified
// Earth communication - Unavailable
// Suspicious activity detected. End of transmission. Mother.

name: Abandoned Moons

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

short_description: Embark with your friends to explore abandoned moons in search of resources and valuable loot in a cooperative first-person horror experience. Level up and assemble a complete arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish the mission.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
